name: Dear Land of Hope
notes:
* Rage Art
* Removes Recoverable Health
* Reversal Break

* Freezes match timer on activation and on hit
* Restores recoverable health on hit
* Transition to attack throw on hit
* Consumes Rage

name: Peekaboo
notes:
* Transition to PAB
* i21? auto high/mid block 
* Can move forward with f after 20F
* Can transition to r1 FC with db after 20F
* Can transition to r1 standing with f+3+4 after 20F 
* Stance moves and the following transitions can be performed instantly after inputting f+3+4:
* Input 3 to shift to r7? LWV (laterally evasive transition)
* Input 4 to shift to r7? RWV (laterally evasive transition)
* Input 3+4 to shift to r1? ALB
* Input f+3_4 to shift to r6 DCK
* Input b+3_4 to shift to r10 SWY
